component.text:
Activity â€“ Calculate the Subnet Mask (Basic)

In this activity, you are given a subnet mask in decimal format.

Enter the binary representation of the subnet mask in the octet fields provided.

Additionally, convert the mask to prefix notation (/x) format in the Prefix Notation field.
You have correctly converted the subnet mask to binary and prefix notation formats. Please click New Number to continue.
You have not correctly converted the subnet mask to binary and/or prefix notation formats. Please click Reset to try again.
